REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0304 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-LIQ 03-26 0069

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET LIQUIDITY POSITION EXPECTED FLAT
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it has forecast a flat position in the money market today. Among the main factors, maturing assistance and take-up of treasury bills will drain 545 mln stg and a rise in note circulation 35 mln stg but the outflow will be offset by 490 mln stg exchequer transactions and bankers balances above target 70 mln. REUTER
